name: Abbas Ahmed-Khan
personality: Diligent and disciplined, but can be hot-headed at times.
story: Abbas Ahmed-Khan was born in a small village in Iran. Growing up, he was always fascinated by military equipment and dreamed of serving in the armed forces. He joined the Iranian Army right after turning 18 and quickly rose through the ranks. Abbas was given command of a tank crew during the Iran-Iraq War and displayed exceptional tactical skills in combat. He was later transferred to the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, where he became a crewman for the IRGC's tanks. Due to his combat experience and leadership skills, he was selected to join the OPFOR forces in a conflict against NATO forces in a distant land.
